description:
Injured in an accident that was not your fault? Hurt on the job and can no longer work? If so, and you live in the Toledo area, you may benefit from the experience of the attorneys at Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC in Toledo, Ohio, to help you secure compensation for your injuries and damages.

We Know How Insurance Companies Think

Insurance companies do not have your best interests in mind. Hence, they will use various tactics to reduce or deny claims. If you are battling with an insurance provider over your rightful compensation, you can trust the attorneys at our law firm to advocate aggressively on your behalf to get you the money you need.

We understand how insurance companies think because many of our attorneys once worked defending insurance companies against liability claims. From this experience, our law firm can effectively hold the companies accountable so they will honor their policies and provide you and your family with the compensation you deserve.

The Experience You Need

Pursue your claim with the benefit of more than 400 years of combined legal experience on your side. Our law firm's attorneys have recovered more than $450 million on behalf of our clients, and we possess the skills and resources necessary to handle the demands of your case regardless of the complexities or challenges involved.

To discuss your needs free of charge, you can contact Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC to schedule an initial appointment with one of our award-winning legal professionals, and we will not charge a fee unless we recover damages on your behalf.
